column4: can anybody help me with this: rsync: recv_generator: mkdir "/home/rgotten/Prueba/Myplasticare/Charts/charts.documents" failed: Permission denied (13)
If you copied the files over from say, a backup drive or something, sometimes it won't deliver your permissions to you, and it winds up being something necessary for sudo to chown/chmod to fix.
it is a windows folder that is share, mounted on the server and i want to make backups to the server?
